评论概述: Cute, well made and heavy for winter months
评论详情: I’m 5’2 and 115 lb and bought a size small in both the cropped sweat top and the matching cargo sweat pants. The set is well made, soft and heavy for cooler winter months. It fits true to size. The top is very cropped so if you like your top to be over your waistband then size up. I will just wear a cute cami underneath and tuck it in. If I still lived up north I’d definitely buy more sets in other colors. Nice enough to wear outside to run errands, shop or go to lunch

The material was high quality, heavy, and soft. I knew it would keep me warm. It is very cropped and fit a bit tight so I would recommend sizing up. Loved the modern look of it and the price was worth it. I didn’t end up keeping it since the fit was so tight.
Very cute! Fabric is very soft (polyester though). It is very nice for wearing indoors. Unfortunately the slightest breeze goes right through it, so it won't do anything for warmth outdoors.

This cropped zip-up is perfect for colder weather! You can buy the matching sweatpants to create a whole set (as seen in this picture) or wear the pieces separately. Material is thick and warm. Super high quality. The inside is fleece-lined so it’ll keep you warm. Make sure to look at the size chart because it clearly states it runs small. I ordered a Medium in the top (bottoms I chose S for tighter fit) and it fit perfectly! I’m 5’4 and 133lbs for reference. I’m wearing the mushroom color, which is a beautiful taupe/nutmeg color
The perfect thing to throw on for running errands or hanging out in the house. I was drawn to the color mostly and it arrived as pictured, true to size.
Very cute but it’s VERY cropped. Way too much for my mom body (even with high waist bottoms).
I’m usually a medium in pants got a size small and they fit like a x-large

ABSOLUTELY AMAZING. Great quality fabric, nice and thick, extremely comfortable and I feel like it fits me well. I am 5’6” 170lbs and I bought size XL  I got the gray set for Christmas ‘23 and I loved it so much that Feb ‘24 that I bought the pink set. I might even buy this in another color!

I usually wear a small but ordered a medium and wish now I had gotten a large. The medium fits perfect through shoulders and chest but is extremely short so wish I had gotten bigger to fit a little more loose
I ordered a medium and it’s a little smaller than I expected but other than that I love it! It’s super cute on and cozy!
This looks really cute but runs really small. The top looks like it can fit a small child. You may need to go up two sizes. I will reorder and get a L to be on the safer side.

I didn’t expect this to be as short as it was. It is nice to wear with something high waisted. It has a lot of weight to it so it is good quality. It is not stretchy or elasticity. The stitching is good and overall in appearance it’s a quality sweatshirt. I think the value is worth the money.

评论概述: Weekend pull on! You won't want to take off!
评论详情: How can you feel so good when running out to the grocery store in a sweatsuit? This is my favorite pair up. Thick and nice quality! Solid zipper. I am a size 4-6 shirt and I am worried about drying the size Medium top. Fits more like a small. Love this color !  Bottoms ran large. But overall I loved this look. I paired it with some cute Nike Low tops and some fun affordable sunglasse All amazon finds!!
Size medium. 10/10

评论概述: Abercrombie Lazy Sunday Half Zip Dupe
评论详情: I am obsessed with the Abercrombie half zip and have been searching for a more affordable dupe. I am a small in that one and got a medium in this one - I would probably even size up to a large. It’s comfy and goes what I need it to😁

Super cute but the collar drives me insaneeeeeee. Since the zipper is relatively ridged, it causes the right side of the collar to creep back towards my face which is annoying. I’ve tried stretching it a bit in hopes to keep the collar more open but it still happens. That’s the only thing I would change.
It's the perfect outfit for looking cute at the airport while still being comfortable.
True to size, excellent quality!

评论概述: Size up if you have a large chest.
评论详情: I love the color, the feel and style of this top however if you have larger breast I would recommend ordering a size up. I still wear it but it’s definitely cropped more than I would like.

On its own, this quarter zip is fine - nothing to write home about, but ultimately OK. My issue is that the color juuust off enough to notice that it doesn't match the supposedly matching pants if you order both in black. The top is slightly lighter/closer to a washed black. If you're ordering individually, it's kind of whatever, but if you're looking to do the set, it will not look coordinated.
I’ve never gotten lucky buying clothes off Amazon, but this was a hidden gem! I would size up for that comfy oversized look.

I love the weight of this sweatshirt and the overall fit.  It has that oversized fit but still shapely.  I do love cropped sweatshirts, but i am giving this one four stars because it really is short.  its not a sweatshirt you can put on to stay warm because your mid section will show even with high waisted leggings.

Totally impressed with the quality of this sweatshirt!! I would have given 5-stars yet the sizing was a bit disappointing. I ordered a small for my 11 yo daughter and it is tiny… Returning for a medium. Recommend sizing up on this one!

I have bought this in two colors and I will be ordering more! It is the perfect comfy lounge set that looks presentable enough to wear out of the house. Perfect for coffee shop study days and running errands. This set keeps you WARM! I'm 5'6" 150 lbs. I usually wear M/L, but I ordered a large in this because I wanted a little room. I'm glad I did because a M would have been too small. Do yourself a favor and order this set! I have it in dark brown and the light green.
I love this set. Super comfortable and soft!

Love it. Good material. Definitely on the thicker side and warm. Very comfortable. I ordered the matching grey and in the picture, it looks more solid. The one I receive has a faint jersey knit pattern to it. I don’t mind at all. I’m 5’3 130 pounds. The medium jacket and small pants fit great on me.

Im 5’2 and a petite 145 with a larger chest so I teeter between a small and medium but opted for the medium and it fit perfectly! I wish the zip went down a little further bc I have a big head so I had to shove it through lol other than that though, it’s the perfect length and pretty thick and warm!
Material was so fine,! I bought this as a gift along with the pants to match. It was a big hit. Extremely plush. Recipient loved this gift.

评论概述: Uhm, why is this so cute?!
评论详情: I literally look fanciest I’ve looked wearing actual sweats. I got the matching pants and WOW, what a look. DEFINITELY size up though. I’m 5’3 145lbs, 36C and I usually wear a medium, but I’m glad I got a large because it fits like an oversized crop top which I love. The material is thick and warm. The mushroom color is stunning and the perfect beige on my tan skin tone. Plus my husband called me hot…in sweats. Highly recommend

This set is soooo cute, but I’m all of 5’4 and the pants FLOOD on me. The top is also too high. Both of these things shrink when you wash them. If they didn’t have this problem the set would be perfect! I didn’t believe the other reviews at first but yeah they flood y’all…

评论概述: I recommend sizing up 1-2 sizes depending on how you’d like it to fit
评论详情: I typically wear a size small (5’6”, 125lbs) but I ordered this in a large because I wanted it to fit a bit oversized. It fits perfectly! The collar is the right amount of height to wear zipped up without it covering my chin, and it is cropped at the perfect length. The fabric is thick and soft. I will be ordering in more colors.
The picture makes it look like it covers more than it does. Im 5'7 and it looked like a crop top on me, left alot of my stomach out/uncovered

I got this for my daughter for Christmas and she looked like the Pillsbury dough boy. It’s very bulky, even the small I purchased. She liked the top more  but the pants were the worst.  Sent them both back.
just make sure u want it really crop.. I felt the picture level of cropped was misleading

评论概述: The pants don't come with the jacket!
评论详情: I didn't like that the pants didn't come with the jacket! I should have read the entire ad.

This set is sooooo comfortable and looks so damn cute! The first day I wore it out I got 3 compliments and have people asking where it's from all the time. Easily better than some of my lulu and alo sets that are $100s more expensive. Highly recommend!  Wearing Smalls in Frosty Green
The quality of this is great. It was just too cropped for me. I’m typically a medium and sized up to a large and an extra large. Both were just too cropped. Hit above my belly button.
Super comfy and warm. Perfect to wear by itself or pair with other layers. It also washes well too!
Size up
Thick and warm, perfect for cool weather and super flattering!
These crop half zips are super popular with my teenagers. This one is soft and wears nicely, runs a bit small. Size up if you’re looking for more of an oversized fit.
The best zip sweater I’ve ever gotten from Amazon. Purchase the whole set if you can, that’s what makes the outfit POP!!
Really cropped
I thought this was true to size and really cute.  So soft on the inside as well. I'm usually a medium and a medium fit perfect
The thickness of the sweatshirt was a surprise! A good surprise! Felt nice and comfortable. It is a true crop top. Good fit for a young adult.
Love the material and design of this sweater. They look pricey.

评论用户: Wish I could have worn this
评论详情: I absolutely adore this too and wear it all the time :)
I sized up from a small and ordered a medium. It fit perfect! Very comfortable and cute. Absolutely love the set. The sweatpants are sold separately, but love the sweatshirt by itself as well!
Love the quarter zip and the cropped length. This has become one of my favorite sweatshirts.
Love, love ,love! Cute with sweats, jeans. Happy with my purchase.
So cute with the matching pants I’m buying another set different color . True to size

When I bought the sweatshirt I thought It would be over sized like what the models looked like in the photos. When I put it on it laid right under my boobs. It felt like it was way too short, like I was wearing a bathing suit short. I knew It would be cropped but not this much. Kinda disappointed. Maybe it’s because I’m a 38 D and that’s why?? Will be returning :(
Soft and I love the fit. It is fitted so size up for a looser fit
It’s thick and so cute on The color is beautiful too
This was a gift

评论概述: Great set, not so great color.
评论详情: I have this in the mushroom color. I loved the quality and fit so much I wanted another color and chose beige. Again, great quality and fit, but it isn’t beige. The color is  pale peach. I don’t love it. Going to try ordering again in hopes it’s true to color.
My most favorite set ever
Didn't expect it to fit the way it did.

I was super excited for this set! Was super cute and then after the first wash all these marks started popping up on the fabric. NOTHING else except this top and pants (purchased separately) started getting random stains all over. My return window closed so now I am stuck with at $80+ set that is covered in stains.
The color was not cream it’s was like a pinkish yellow shade
Runs small size up a size or two!
Would be a great product if sizing was correct.  If you order a small but need a medium, the only thing that truly changes is the size of the arms.  Not the overall product.  Wouldn't recommend...

评论概述: Did not get the whole product.
评论详情: I ordered the set and only got the top! I will be returning it since the whole reason for buying it was for the set. Super disappointed!!
Very cheap, and you only get a few washes out of it before it shrinks.
didn’t like it at all..i bought the set

评论概述: How is this a frequently returned item?
评论详情: As someone who purchases a lot and returns if it’s not as described or pictured, this by far is not an item I’m going to return but buy it in every color. So cute and soft.

I love the color on this one because it really is giving beautiful pastel vibes! Love how the top fits because it’s loose but also flattering at the same time! Love the neck on it because there’s no hoodie and that bothers me a lot when I have my hair down! Material is very soft and stretchy! 10/10

评论概述: The most comfortable and flattering sweat suit set!
评论详情: Love this set so much! Its is warm, cozy and flattering
The cropped top is way shorter that images.  Barely comes over boobs.
Love this comfy sweater! It’s so warm and the quality is amazing defiantly going to order more in different colors!

评论概述: Love the Qinsen Half Zip Crop!
评论详情: This sweatshirt is a great addition to my wardrobe. I would recommend sizing up one size. I wear a small, so I got a medium and it fits great. It is cropped enough but still loose in the arms and the arm length is perfect. The material is super soft and structured. It feels very high quality and I love all of the colors it comes in. Great to wear with leggings, jeans or matching sweatpants. Definitely recommend.
I love the fit, its perfect! I love length and cinch at the waist. Soft and cozy material, perfect for fall/ winter. The color is absolutely beautiful
Very comfy set! Went to order another and bummed they are sold separately for double the price now though.
Super cute
Super cute cropped sweatshirt! Great thick material not see through. Would be super cute with just leggings but the matching pants make the full look!
I love this set so much! You need to get this right now. Its so affordable and so comfortable. It would make such a great gift! Buy it now.

Iam 5 3” and 120 pounds and usually wear a xs/s  this sweatshirt is very cropped and in my opinion runs slightly small. I would say size up one or two sizes depending on how you want it to fit. I sized up to a large for a slightly oversized cropped look and am so glad I did because there was slight shrinkage when washed. The quality of this is good and it’s a nice thick sweatshirt. Definitely want more colours!!!!

This is such a cute sweater. It’s soft and perfect length. I love the half zip and the black is true think black. I got a small and it fits a little snug so if you want a little baggy size up. I usually take smalls in all my clothing. Great price. Definitely recommend
Was a lot more yellow cream than the picture shows otherwise it’s nice and good quality

I ordered a medium, slight shrinkage after washing. Fits well, cozy while being casually professional looking at same time. Prefer wearing this collared half zip sweater to a turtleneck sweater in winter.
